WELCOME TO IMMUNITEE
Immunite is a trusted platform for Digital Health Passport. Your clinical data is kept at secured blockchain with unique private key that only owned by you. Your clinical data will only be shared with your consent.

I agree to the terms and privacy policy. I hereby acknowledged confirm of the above changes and agreed to the terms and policy of Immunitee Already have an account? Login. Sign Up Complete Thank you for signing \n up with IMMUNITEE! Check your email. A verification link has \nbeen sent to your email address. Click on \nit to verify your account. Please enter the following information to retrieve your password. By showing this QR code to a person, you hereby confirmed to grant this person the right to read your personal medical history. This QR Code is one time use and it expires in 5 minutes. Tell us more about yourself Have you done any vaccination? Past Vaccination Data Successfully Completed!\nPlease wait for your search result and your next steps of action Please Verify the Mobile sent to you to receive an Activation Code to complete your setup! Enter Activation Code Your account is activated. You shall receive a Personal Private Key at your registered email. For security purpose, we encourage you to create 4 digit PIN against unauthorized access. Manually Sync Your Device Disclaimer The verification for entry to a destination is done at our best knowledge. It is for reference and does not guarantee a entry to the destination desired. The right of entry to a destination is remained at the authority of entry owner.

Authentic, Secure & \nResourceful
Secured and safe traveling solution.\nIntelligent algorithm to measure and qualify your trip. Globally recognized Health Passport. Ensure privacy & confidentiality through blockchain technology.
Simple & Trusted \nVerification Easy scan and hassle free traveling. Online Test Result Access to nearest Immunitee partner clinic and lab networks. Access to secured digital test data. Keep, share and protect your data with Private Key. Scan & Go Your Digital Health Passport with \"Private Key\" for verification and accessibility to your destination. Entry \nRequirements & Status Qualify your trip with clinical requirement as needed for the destination country.
//tutorial Easy and simple sign up steps. Fields are designed to meet cross countries requirement. Feature to add dependent. You can add travel destination and check your entry status. You can also get more details on the entry requirement through Immunitee. 1. Adding your favourite or upcoming destination.\n\n2. Click on to the destination to check entry requirements. Check your entry status before travel. Book your test at the nearest Immunitee partners clinic/lab. Obtained your clinical data digitally through blockchain. Secure and privacy assured. Add World Entries Check Entry Requirement Traceable \nVaccine & Test Data
Vaccine Test Personal Profile Details has restricted the entry of all foreign nationals except those with prior approval from the government. Travelers with approval from low-risk countries will be issued with a 7-day SHN (Stay-Home-Notice), or no SHN from September 1. Get 1 Month Free Trail Enter your security PIN to login!
